text: McFarland & Company, Inc. is an independent book publisher in Jefferson, North Carolina. They focus on academic and reference books, as well as general interest nonfiction for adults. Its president is Rhonda Herman. Its former president and current editor-in-chief is Robert Franklin, who created the company in 1979. McFarland has about 50 employees, and has published 7,800 books. McFarland's initial print is about 600 copies per book. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Publishing companies of the United States Category:1979 establishments in the United States Category:Companies based in North Carolina
title: McFarland & Company
